trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Viser <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> datatyper til [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: GenericRootAutomationPeer is used as a peer for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> when it contains the following tree: ![HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource->Visual->2 UIElement objects") Because only <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types have peers, and visuals are not <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types, a common parent does not exist in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: GenericRootAutomationPeer brukes som en node for <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>når den inneholder følgende treet: ![HwndSource - > Visual - >&2; UIElement objekter](~/add/media/apgenericroot.png "HwndSource-> Visual->&2; UIElement objekter") fordi bare <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>typer har noder og visninger er ikke <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>typer, en felles overordnet ikke finnes i den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tre for den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>typer.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] expects a single root peer from the application; therefore, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] creates a GenericRootAutomationPeer for the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> in order to serve as a single root peer to parent peers for the two <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]forventer en enkelt roten node fra applikasjonen. Derfor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] oppretter en GenericRootAutomationPeer for den <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>for å fungere som en enkelt roten node til overordnede noder for de to tabellene <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>typer.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the root peer is a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Root-node er vanligvis en <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrolltypen for den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> som representerer det avgrensende rektangelet for den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Det avgrensende rektangelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Pane".
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder "Ruten".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter tekstetiketten for den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GenericRootAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se på name-egenskapen som om det er en tekststreng med brukere som forklarer kontrollen de refererer til.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at du har en tekstrepresentasjon for alle kontroller av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] slik at du programmatisk kan referere til kontrollen i en lokalisert måte.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som inneholder etiketten.
